1884 Lawson's Baseball game. Patened on Sept 16, 1884. 
This is the 1st known Baseball game ever produced.

 STRIKER card graded by SGC a MINT SGC-96. 

Affordable high grade 125 year old card!


$150.00 dlvd  - Paypal OK no fee
